name: Lamlami's Restaurant
description:
It is a game inspired by children's games that were made with Adobe Flash.

It's a game that brings the food that children order accurately.

Some children are impatient.

You need to bring food quickly before the children leave the restaurant.

Language is displayed only in Korean.

The Android version can also be downloaded via the link below.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Byeolkuk.Bunsik
